org.apache.coyote.http11.filters

类 FlushableGZIPOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • java.io.FilterOutputStream
        • java.util.zip.DeflaterOutputStream
          • java.util.zip.GZIPOutputStream
            • org.apache.coyote.http11.filters.FlushableGZIPOutputStream
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class FlushableGZIPOutputStream
extends java.util.zip.GZIPOutputStream
    Extension of GZIPOutputStream to workaround for a couple of long standing JDK bugs (Bug 4255743 and Bug 4813885) so the GZIP'd output can be flushed.

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 java.util.zip.GZIPOutputStream

        crc

      • 从类继承的字段 java.util.zip.DeflaterOutputStream

        buf, def

      • 从类继承的字段 java.io.FilterOutputStream

        out
